---
name: "Commercial distribution / permission request"
about: "Request written permission to commercially distribute or monetize the software under the CNARS license. Use this template instead of emailing if you'd like a tracked request."
title: "[Commercial request] â€” Replace with short title"
labels: "commercial-request"
assignees: ""
---

Thanks for opening a request to distribute or commercially use this project. Please fill in the details below so the maintainers can evaluate your request. If you also want to email the copyright holder, see the contact details in `LICENSE.md`.

### Project / Organization name

Provide the legal name and/or GitHub org of the party requesting permission.

### Representative contact (name, email)

Provide the primary contact for this request.

### Intended use / Product description

Describe how you'll use or distribute the Software. Include the product name, distribution channels (website, app store, third-party marketplace, OEM, etc.), and whether the Software will be modified or included unmodified.

### Commercial model & expected revenue

Explain the revenue model (one-time sale, subscriptions, ads, service fees, etc.) and an estimate of expected annual gross revenue from the product (ballpark figure is fine).

### Territory and users

Which countries/markets will this distribution target? Any export controls or restricted jurisdictions?

### Proposed revenue share

State the revenue share you're willing to pay (default in the license is 20% of net revenue). If you have a different proposal, state it and justify.

### Net-revenue definition / direct costs you expect to deduct

List the direct costs you expect to deduct from gross revenue to determine net revenue (examples: payment processing fees, hosting, third-party manufacturing). This helps speed up evaluation.

### Can you provide a draft commercialization agreement?

Attach/describe any draft agreement or standard contract your organization prefers.

### Timeline

Desired start date for distribution and any key milestones.

### Additional notes / attachments

Add any extra information or attachments (screenshots, mockups, links to product pages, or legal entities).

---

By submitting this request you confirm:

- You have read and understand the CNARS v1.0 license in `LICENSE.md`.
- You will not commercially distribute the Software until you receive explicit written permission from the Copyright Holder.
- You understand the license's revenue-share and reporting expectations and will supply quarterly reports and payments if a commercialization agreement is reached.

Maintainers will review requests and reply on this issue thread. If permission is granted, maintainers will post the written permission/agreement terms in this thread (and may move to a private channel or attach a redacted agreement as appropriate).

If you prefer to contact the Copyright Holder directly by email, see the contact section in `LICENSE.md`.
